about_the_game:
[b[i]]jump Up!!!!!!! Save your Princess!!![/i][/b]
Countless obstacles are waiting for you! Show your jumping and control skills!
The princess is waiting for you!!!
It's an action game that emphasizes jumping
Do jump action and save the princess in the last place to avoid various obstacles!!

=story=
The game is set in an exciting adventure featuring a cute Shiba dog. Shiba dog is not just a cute dog, but a knight of steel with will and courage. Shiba dog is wearing shining armor and is in charge of rescuing a princess to restore peace.

The story of the game begins when the dog heads to the enemy's castle to save the princess. Unfortunately, however, he is attacked by the enemy unexpectedly and crashes from high above. The unconscious dog wakes up collapsed and finds himself on a mysterious island. The island is like a maze, an unknown place with threats everywhere.

The woke Shiba dog is confused at first, but he soon comes up with his mission and decides to cheer up to explore the island. Along the island's path, obstacles made of large and small stones are blocking the dog's path. These obstacles are not just rubble, but are challenges that test the dog's courage and wisdom.

Shiba Inu pauses, but his determination keeps him on his feet. He jumps over obstacles, climbs, and sometimes breaks through in other ways. Continuing along the way, he finally reaches the center of the island, where he finds a terrifying dragon kidnapping and locking up the princess.

The Shiba dog decides to fight the dragon to rescue the princess. This last fight requires all of Shiba's ability and courage, and the player must help the Shiba dog rescue the princess and regain peace.

Throughout the course of the game, players must take advantage of the Shiba dog's various abilities, and must wisely overcome each obstacle and enemy. In the process, the Shiba dog grows stronger and becomes a true knight.

With cute graphics, exciting storylines, challenging puzzles and action elements, this game will bring players a different kind of fun.

name: Shiba Knight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
